markdownRemark.html: Hello, my name is John (loosely translated from english) and I am self-taught javascript developer (mostly frontend for now!). My knowledge comes from courses, videos, books, forums, building own projects. Started from bascis of CSS and HTML then dived deep down to javascript and currently working with React framework! During studying on my main task of becoming a web developer I'm also improving my computer science knowledge such as algorithms and programming paradigms.
